Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two figures that represent students on a page. (basic representation of participants)
CANNOT: The student cannot accurately represent the connection over a distance using a string. (student might not draw a connecting line at all or creates a line without any context)
The student cannot illustrate how the device uses sound to communicate information. (student might not include any sound waves or relevant symbols)
The student cannot show specific parts designed for sending or receiving sounds. (lack of drawn features that signify functionality, like cups or cans)
The student cannot depict the correct materials used in constructing a string telephone. (may include incorrect objects, like electronic components)
The student cannot demonstrate why communicating over a long distance with the device is useful. (no indication of purpose in the drawing)
The student cannot identify features making it a functioning communication device. (no details distinguishing how it works, maybe only two people are drawn)
